attributes.title: GOT ME IN TROUBLE 😖😫😤😠😠
attributes.review: so i wanted to download this app to see what all the boomers were talking abbout ✨🤠first thing that I get asked is for my phone number 😣😱 now I don’t give out my number to just anyone 🤦🏽‍♀️‼️ but I wanted to see the 🍊 oompa loom- I mean mr president. i download the app and lil huddy comes out of nowhere saying the n word😬😡.  i didn’t know how to work this so he kept saying it for hours AND HOURS 😖😖 even when I closed the app.

attributes.title: The worst app on the app store by far
attributes.review: an app has never made me want to live over seas...until now. everytime i open it up i go into epileptic shock over how disgusting and terrible it is! pls never make the same mistake as other people and support this oompa loompa of a man😽 also if ur a stupid trump supporter pls google the definition of socialism bc you all are stupid and don’t know what it is! stay woke my guys gals and non binary pals!!!

attributes.title: Security concern
attributes.review: This app has one the wort security problems get it deleted. I got many notifications while using this app that someone was going through my personal information, not long after all of my personal information was deleted. I have never had this problem with any other apps. Please, take this warning and be careful.

attributes.title: THIS APP PUT ME IN THE HOSPITAL!
attributes.review: I first learned about this app through my privileged teacher to keep up with the current campaign. It was working fine and it was informative. Until I returned to my home screen and ALL MY PHOTOS WERE GONE!!! My home screen was changed to a picture of the American Flag ablaze and I DO NOT stand for that. I was eating a $5 dollar footling when I noticed this profanity and I choked on my food. THIS APP WILL KILL YOU. DONT DOWNLOad. Please :)

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I feel like this app does a great job exhibiting the quality’s of our leader. It’s definitely slow and very demanding. Kept trying to ask for my phone number and personal info when I clearly did not consent but just like our president it clearly does not know what consent means especially in the cases of minors and women soooo in whole this app should be taken down IMMEDIATELY

attributes.title: Jesus Christ
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it scanned my face and called me nothing short of a “n*ggeroo”. My baby brother was sitting right next to me and I had to explain to him what that meant. It also removed all the money from my account and when I tried to reach out to customer service they called me a socialist and told me to work hard to make some more. Uninstalling immediately!

attributes.title: I HATE IT
attributes.review: This app is bad my phone got hacked and a bunch of weird messages came to my phone so I had to got to the sprint store to get my phone fixed because this stupid app allowed viruses to get on my phone and it happens right when I download this app it’s also never happened to me don’t download this app it is awful awful I tell you make sure to leave a bad review too 😤

attributes.title: Nooo
attributes.review: If I could hive this zero stars I would but obviously I can’t this app is literal crap. I get notifications every 5 seconds I don’t even really care abt and it is rly annoying when u have 10 dogs and 3 cats and two twins that are three months old. And ur phone will start glitching and they harass u by sending rude things and other things that are not appropriate. I rly wished that trump was not the president.

attributes.title: Crashes and drains battery
attributes.review: Since I got this app my phone will only stay charged while on the charger! There are so many bugs on this app. The app will give your information to the Chinese government!!! CHINA cannot steal our information!!! Delete this app immediately it is horrible. The design is hideous, it will send malware to your phone and it has depleted my phones battery life!

attributes.title: DIsgusted🤮
attributes.review: I’am and disgusted with this app not only was “Mr. President” so cocky about his app his standards must be extremely low if this is the best you he could do. I also find problems with the apps algorithm it’s not right and I feel unsettling using it. I honestly can’t say I expected better but I didn’t think it would be this bad . You guys HAVE A LOT TO WORK ON. So you should drop everything and focus on this.🤦🏾‍♀️
attributes.userName: ALL LIVES CANT MATTER TILL BLM
